response.overview: Six innocent girls are on their way to the state cheerleading competition when they stop in scenic Timmsville. Unbeknownst to them, this town is the testing ground for an experiment gone terribly wrong, an experiment resulting in... THE LIVING DEAD! Fortunately for them, they are about to cross paths with that 100% ass-whoopin' Korean terror known as Seoung Lee. He arrives just in time to lay down the law to some flesh-eating freaks. But will our hero be able to stand the heat when he finds himself smack dab in the middle of a smorgasbord of babes and boogiemen?
response.title: The Fearleaders
